https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pq4ecFax9bo91Wq26g777WPy5Q.jpg When the wife of Indian immigrant Matt Singh dies suddenly (having kept her illness a secret), the successful businessman suddenly finds himself adrift and despairing -- feelings only heightened by a visit from his son. With memories of the past threatening to obscure the promise of the future, Matt struggles to summon the strength to move on. Dancing in Twilight
